summary: Adds two new weapons in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Weapon: Baby Boom
How to get? craft it with ale.

Weapon: Boink
How to get? Craft it with troll fat at a cooking pot, needs the shout dragonrend first though.

You might ask, why don't you re-texture the weapons?
Answer: Because I don't want to, but I might. 
[size=3]
FrequentlyAnsweredQuestions
FAQ:
[/size][size=6]What?
[/size][size=3]Answer: Those are weapons.

[/size][size=6]Why?[/size]
[size=3]Answer: I am not a lion so shut up.

[/size][size=6]How?[/size]
[size=3]Answer: Because I can.
[/size][size=6]                 [/size]
author: Hotaco
